WonderkidAnswered on 14 Aug 2019As a fellow DBS CC user I feel your pain.What I'm currently doing is manually entering into the seedly app as I find it the most convenient (no need to remember and key in at home, can track immediately).I have reduced the SMS alert for my card to anything over a $1 transaction. This way I have a record of most of my CC spend on my SMS to double check.Lastly, I check the ibanking record every week as there are certain transactions that are not SMS to me (like recurring transaction for phone bills)0 comments1
